data.description:
When you create this symbol, choose a status effect: dazed, shaken, slow, or weak. Then, choose one option: the creature bearing this symbol gains immunity to the chosen status effect; or the creature bearing this symbol loses immunity to the chosen status effect and cannot gain it.

You Spend: @LOSS[2 ip]
Target Receives: @EFFECT[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.G7eb8vHOu48YfAeC], @EFFECT[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.xjkcH1jtZyJjBEfJ], @EFFECT[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.1amz1YVyXCJuwFGQ], @EFFECT[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.nNzzp5fPDyq4XVmE], @EFFECT[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.jb9fisS1YJ5FVG2P], @EFFECT[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.n5RbU9RxPYyGwB5B], @EFFECT[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.eVV95GhWiRTEK5my], or @EFFECT[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.kDgnLl4tCn8nEIES]
